comments.body: It's a club which has members who conduct and participate in MUNs.
is the pes mun worth it? they're asking for 1000 rs plus ill have to go to the rr campus ( Im from ec campus)
It's absolutely worth it! I had an amazing time last PeCon 10/10 would recommend it.

It's the annual MUN conference of PES conducted by the MUN society of PES.
MUN stands for Model United Nations. Think of it as a smaller version of the actual UN bodies eg: UNHRC,UNSC , DISEC etc. 
You get to choose to represent a particular country and you get to talk and formulate and discuss global issues that interest you. 
I attended PeCon last year and I absolutely loved that experience, do try it! You get to meet a lot of people and it will be a new experience
